bibl.title: P. Oxy. 2624: A New Fragment of Pindar?
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXXII, 2624 = Denys Page, Supplementum Lyricis Graecis (Oxford, 1974) pp. 124-138, Nos S 387-442. 56 fragments of choral lyric for which Mr. Lobel suggested Simonides as author.
bibl.seg: van der Weiden Marianne, P. Oxy. 2624: A New Fragment of Pindar?
P. Oxy. XXXII, 2624 = Denys Page, Supplementum Lyricis Graecis (Oxford, 1974) pp. 124-138, Nos S 387-442. 56 fragments of choral lyric for which Mr. Lobel suggested Simonides as author.
